official-title.#text: To delay for 1 year the application of Revenue Ruling 2012–18 with respect to the characterization of payments as tips or service charges.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not apply Revenue Ruling 2012–18 (or any other similar guidance) for purposes of determining whether any payment made before January 1, 2015, is a tip as opposed to a service charge.

header.#text: Delay in application of Revenue Ruling 2012–18 with respect to characterization of tips or service charges

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5341 IH: To delay for 1 year the application of Revenue Ruling 2012–18 with respect to the characterization of payments as tips or service charges.
